name: ScanForPay – Alipay & AlipayHK & WechatPay Payment Solutions for WooCommerce
author: ScanForPay

sections.description:
ScanForPay為使用WooCommerce的香港商戶提供Alipay、AlipayHK、WechatPay的收款服務, 並同時支持PC和移動端.
We provide a service to make your store accept Alipay, AlipayHK and WechatPay. And our plugin can be used both on PC or mobile.

對於您的客人:
使用內地版支付寶(人民幣)或者香港版AlipayHK（港幣）支付您商城的訂單.
To your customers:
They can pay with mainland Alipay(RMB) or AlipayHK(HKD) when shopping in your store.

對於您:
結算港幣到您的銀行帳戶.
To you:
HongKong Dollars will be settled to your bank account.

為什麼選擇我們?

Why choose us?

  • 同時支持內地和香港支付寶，Wechat收款, 無須開多個帳戶, 擴大您的客人範圍.
  • 免費開通, 沒有安裝費、月費、年費等費用.
  • 支付寶結算週期T+2, 微信結算週期T+3，方便您的資金流動.

  • ScanForPay是支付寶、微信官方授權的ISV(技術服務商), 可以為您訂製更多的個性化需求

  • Expand your business by accepting Alipay, AlipayHK and WechatPay with only one account, one plugin.

  • Open an account for free. No installation fee, monthly fee or annual fee will be charged.
  • The settlement period for Alipay is T+2, for Wechat is T+3.
  • ScanForPay is the ISV of Alipay, WechatPay, we can provide other customized services.

如何使用

How to Use

  • 在使用插件前您需要先申請一個商戶帳號, 您可以訪問我們的網站https://hk.scanForpay.com, 也可以直接通过电话联系我们.

  • 當您申請好帳戶後, 安裝此插件, 並將我們給您的商戶id, partnerNo等填入對應的設置裡, 就可以立即開始使用了.

  • Before using our plugin, first you need to apply for the account. You can visit our website https://hk.scanForpay.com, or contact us by phone.

  • When you get your account, install the plugin and fill in the right informations, then you can start to use it.

您還可以查看我們的使用教程：

如何讓你的WordPress WooCommerce店铺使用支付寶、微信收款？

聯絡電話(tel): (852)-81207808

开通商户版账户后, 您还可以获得其他功能

You can get these by getting an account

  • 實體門店掃碼支付
  • 實體門店商戶二維碼支付
  • 線上商店的支付寶、微信網關, 幫助您各種形式的網店接入支付寶、微信

  • ScanForPay為您提供的收款App, PC端管理台, 方便您收款, 查帳等.

  • Collect money by scanning customers’ Qrcode.

  • Collect money by displaying a merchant Qrcode to customers.
  • Payment gateway for online shop.
  • ScanForPay Apps to manage orders.
sections.installation:
1. WordPress -> Plugins, 點擊 “Add New”. 在搜索框內搜索“ScanForPay”.
  2. 點擊Install, 然後點擊activate來激活插件.
  3. 聯絡ScanForPay, 申請您的ScanForPay商戶帳號.
  4. 申請成功後, 您會獲得您的商戶號, partnerNo和signKey, 填入ScanForPay的插件設置裡

  5. 您可以開始支付寶、微信收款啦!

  6. WordPress -> Plugins, click “Add New”. search ScanForPay”.

  7. Click Install, and then click activate.
  8. ContactScanForPay to apply for an account.
  9. Once apply successfully, you will get your merchant No., partnerNo and signKey, fill in the plugin configurations.
  10. Start using now!
sections.faq:
• 我為什麼需要開通支付寶/AlipayHK/WechatPay收款?

現在支付寶的全球用戶已經超過10億, WechatPay用戶數已經超過9億，中國的電商用戶超過8億, 電商海淘用戶也已超過1億. 滿足中國用戶的支付需要和習慣已經成為很多商戶的剛需.

並且支付寶、微信目前專門成立了AlipayHK、WechatPayHK針對香港本地用戶進行推廣, 有更多的優惠和方便功能推出.

  • ScanForPay是免费的么?

ScanForPay的WooCommerce插件是完全免費的, 開通香港的商戶版支付寶、微信目前也完全免費, 但是支付寶、微信會對每筆交易收取一定的手續費. 具體手續費用請聯絡並諮詢我們.

網站: https://hk.scanforpay.com
電話: (852)-81207808

  • 我可以使用個人支付寶、微信進行收款麼?

不可以, 個人支付寶、微信只能在支付寶、微信內轉帳, 並沒有提供開放的接口在網店中使用.

更多問題, 請訪問我們的常見問題

  • Why you should accept Alipay/AlipayHK/WechatPay in your store?
    The global users of Alipay has been over 1 billion now, and the users of WechatPay has also been more than 900 million. And there’re 800 million e-commerce users, in which 100 million users have experience with shopping from overseas. So it’s an urgent needs for merchants to provide a convenient payment method for Chinese customers.

And also, there will be many promotions and convenient functions for HongKong local users by using AliapyHK and WechatPayHK.

  • Is it free to use ScanForPay?

It’s totally free to use our WooCommerce plugin, and opening account is also a service for free.
But Alipay, WechatPay would charge for each transaction. For more details please contact us.

website: https://hk.scanforpay.com
tel: (852)-81207808

  • Can I use my personal Alipay, WechatPay to collect money?

No, you can’t. You can only tranfer your money to others in Alipay/Wechat by using the personal version. There’s no open APIs can be used in an online shop.
